contest-event.event-date:
May 17, 1952 D Grand Shield British Open Spring Festival (Grand Shield) 10 Test Piece Contest British Open Spring Festival grand-shield Winners back to 1952 are as engraved on the current Grand Shield trophy. Except for 1981 to 1984 where the bands on the trophy appear to have come second, not first! Was a different trophy given to the winners? If you know the answer please let us know.

There are also results on the trophy from 1902 to 1938, but they are for the Crystal Palace Contest (see link at top of page). Test Piece Contest Pride of Race Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK May 1, 2010, 5:36 p.m. June 16, 2015, 4:58 p.m. 1 Leyland Band Harold Moss 2 Irwell Springs Frederick Lonsdale Garth 3 Woolley Colliery George Thompson 4 Wallace Arnold (Rothwell) Band Albert Lunn Unknown Result Haigh Prize Charles Hulse Unknown Result Skelmanthorpe Band Harry Mileman Unknown Result Hollingworth J. A. Greenwood Unknown Result Moderna Blanket Works Tom Casson Unknown Result Dobcross Silver Band Jimmy Platt Unknown Result Slaithwaite Band Alex Mortimer Unknown Result Royston New Monckton Colliery Institute William Foster Unknown Result Crossley's Carpet Works John Harrison Unknown Result Staveley Works Band William Knight Unknown Result Stretford Band Ronald Yarwood Unknown Result Lindley Band Peter Wadsworth
